title: Just like machines
creator_credit: Tasmanian Film Corporation and Don Anderson
brief_description: Instructs on safe methods of handling pesticides, their application and storage. Stresses that the Department of Agriculture should be contacted for advice as to which pesticide to use for which pest, when there is doubt as to identity. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
